tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had been to the clinic for an tooth issue. Dr. Girija ( Senior well experienced doctor) explained me that the tooth needs immediate attention and RCT has to be performed on it. Later, she also suggested that lot of other tooths are having gaps, decay and cavities. Advised me to do cleaning and fillings. I was so convinced that i underwent all the treatment and fillings. Now I feel totally a different experience. I realised that, I was living with dental issues from quite long time. 
The clinic ambience is good, not too crowded so that we have to wait long time. The hospitality of other doctors and staffs are very good and they treat, greet patients well. 
Overall I like it. I would definitely recommend this clinic for any kind of dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,
review: Recently I visited Partha Dental Clinic Dasarahalli branch when I was suffering from a severe toothache.. Dr. Girija attended me and suggested a RCT in the lower jaw and an extraction in the upper jaw.. Dr. Girija gave me the best dental experience ever with her expertise and was able to recover soon.. Staff members were polite and helpful..would like to thank Dr. Girija and would definitely recommend Partha to my contacts..

I had visited the Partha Dental clinic for my Dental checkup and filling of tooth. Dr. Girija ma’am was very friendly and patient. Though She was late for only few minutes but she apologised with a smile ( I have not seen any doctor doing that)
 She carefully conducted the procedure without any discomfort. She also advised and recommended on Dental  alignment with right reasoning and  why it’s important. 
I felt extremely comfortable in her good hands and I strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very good experience with her  I am immensely impressed with her treatment and nature. Clinic in best. Staff and Dr is good. Best experience with dentist

Dr Girija Fixed the crown on top right implant after the crown on side by implant was broken.Her handling of the procedure was good and she explained nicely the care to be taken to not to repeat again.
1. Doctor and clinic staff were not at all helpful. 2. Appointment  fees mentioned in Practo is 300/- we were charged 500/-.

review: Dr Girija is very friendly she removed my badly damaged tooth effortlessly. I am satisfied with her treatment

review: Superb treatment done by Dr madam. I had little overlap of my front teeth but didn't have time to get any braces treatment. Dr did some teeth modification lightly and my teeth looks straight.  I am happy with the result

review: Treatment is superb and dr and staff are kind and caring. Recall follow up was done perfectly. Clinic is neat and clean.

review: Dr girija is an amazing dr. She did filling for me with in  few minutes. She also explained how to maintain healthy teeth. Thanks Dr

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Gr. Girija and team helped my son to cure his pain. She has done root canal and managed my son efficiently. Thank you doctor
Dr Girija did finishing for my previously filled overhanging filling which was left by previous Dr. She is very good Dr
**** ******* Did my RCT and it was good. Thank you. She was helping me regarding my oral hygiene also
**** ********.helped me with saving my tooth. Did RCT for my decayed tooth and placed cap. Thank you soo much doctor
I have got RCT and zirconia crowns done from Dr Girija. She is very good Dr their service is good and took very good care. Clinic is very neat and clean
Very good experience with Dr. Girija. She is a wonderful doctor.  I recommend this clinic to everyone
I have been taking treatment for my hair with dr Girija. Positive Results seen. I would recommend her for hair growth treatment. Clinic is neat and clean. Dr and staffs are good.

Did my PRP treatment in partha clinic. I saw tremendous change in hair volume. My hair loss reduced. And i am observing the growth of new hairs. Thank you Dr. Girija for helping me out. I recommend this clinic
